{{Wired embedded system |brand=Vonage |model=VDV21 |revision=-VD |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U10V027 |type=analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM1111 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640DBTC-90G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=AC201 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=High-Voltage Ringing SLIC Device for VolP Applications;Legerity;Le9500DBJC;;2; |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user=router |default_pass=router |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Analog Phone Gateway}}
Manufactured by [[Foxconn]]/[[Ambit]] Microsystems/Hon Hai :(internal model [[Foxconn]] U10V027)
There are two Legerity Le9500DBJC on-board.
===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''DVE''' :DSA-18W-12 US1 120180 (12V, 1.5A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
